body.name: ACOFWENL Mini Printer Inkless Sticker Printer Pocket Mini Thermal Printer Sticker Maker Machine with 8 Rolls Continuous Paper for Photo Journal, Fun, Work

features: 【mini thermal printerr】 This inkless sticker printer mini pocket printer measures 3.3 x 3.3 x 1.8 inches , It’s also an mini photo printer, supporting reliable black and white printing at a high-resolution of 203 DPI

【Thermal Printer Paper】 The mini portable printer comes with 9 rolls of various inkless printer paper, including 3 rolls of sticker paper, 3 rolls of white plain paper and 3 rolls of colorful plain paper, making it perfect for various daily printing needs

【bluetooth printer】connects wirelessly to your cell phone via Bluetooth. The app offers a wide range of printing options and materials, including photo/label/post-it/web/document printing, as well as festival/animal/plant materials, and more

【Versatile Usage】 The portable sticker printer machine offers a wide range of applications for various aspects of life. It serves as a sticker printer, receipt printer, and pocket printer, allowing you to print study notes, to-do lists, and more to enhance studying and work efficiency. Moreover, it enables you to print pictures and photos to capture life’s precious moments anytime, anywhere.

【Unique and Creative Gift】 The mini sticker printer boasts an excellent design and user-friendly features, making it an indispensable life assistant. It not only nurtures children’s creativity but also allows you to record happy moments effortlessly. Furthermore, it can serve as a special gift for friends, children, loved ones, and DIY enthusiasts, making it a truly unique and thoughtful present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loved it
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift for my sister. She had it on her wish list for quite some time. Now it's hers and she's really enjoying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My teen loves this sticker printer for photos and labels. Keep in mind it's monochromatic so you won't be able to print color stickers. Some of the rolls are color though.The app is easy to use and lets you adjust the photo size and make other tweaks. It was simple to connect the printer.It came with a lot of extra rolls so it should last awhile!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Poor printing quality
reviews.reviewText: The product is a great size. The printing quality is terrible and no setting changes improve it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its such a tiny cordless printer and it actually prints pretty decent pictures
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ordered this mini printer mainly for nostalgic reasons. When I was in high school, several decades ago, I had a pocket calculator that had a thermal printer built into it. The paper was only one and quarter inches wide and it was ghastly expensive. Whereas my calculator could only print equations, this mini printer will print any picture, graphic, banner, or doodle that you send to it.There are a couple errors in the listing posted on Amazon. It is nothing bad, but I thought it should be noted. In the title it states you will receive 8 rolls of paper and in the description it states you will receive 9 rolls of paper. Actually both of these are wrong, you will receive 10 rolls of paper! Four rolls of white paper, three rolls of colored paper, and three rolls of colored stickers.This mini printer does require an app to print. It uses an app called Tiny Print. The app is actually pretty good. It will allow you to print any picture that is stored on your phone. The app gives you the ability to access your photo albums and it also has a feature to allow you to do basic editing, add simple text or graphics to your picture. You can then save and print the picture. There is also an A.I. feature that has you give it a word or phrase and it will develop a piece of artwork from your input. Personally I did not find the A.I. to be that great. I gave it the phrase: Away in a manger, and it drew a picture of a horse.A very important thing to keep in mind if you are considering purchasing this mini printer: This is a thermal printer, meaning it will only print in monochrome (also known as black & white). It will NOT pint in color! The Tiny Print app takes your picture or image and first converts it to monochrome before sending it to the printer.Also, another very important piece of information: This is a very small printer, so the print quality is very basic. It prints at 200 d.p.i. (dots per inch). Take a look at one of pictures I posted, it has several sample pictures and a banner that I made from this printer.What is included in the box: The mini printer, USB to USB-C charging cable, nine sealed rolls of paper with the tenth roll in the printer, and lastly an instruction sheet. Note: you will need to charge the printer before you can use it. It has a built in 800mAh battery, so it should take an hour or less to charge.This mini or pocket printer is a fun little printer and I believe it would make a wonderful Christmas or birthday gift for an older child or even a parent or grandparent. It could even make a great stocking stuffer!At the time of this review the ACOFWENL Ink-less Pocket Mini Thermal Printer was selling for $28.99 which is a great price for this mighty little printer. Yes, I highly recommend this printer to anyone interested in having a pocket size printer at the ready! Again, it will make a wonderful gift!
